attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While I respect and observe the law on using the mobile phone when driving I can not take it seriously that it is more dangerous to talk on a phone than to drive while having something on fire in your mouth. The smoke gets in your eyes, the fire end can drop between your legs and the act of lighting the fire tube can destract. If a person can be prosecuted for having a Kit Kat between the fingers how about prosecuting for a fire tube.
